modName: Belrands Wolf Will Not Go Hostile if Attacked
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that I was compelled to make after reading a post on the forums, where a player was frustrated that the follower Belrand\'s summoned wolf would go hostile every time it was accidentally attacked. Here is the post:

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/712037-is-there-a-mod-to-make-follower-conjurations-non-hostile-if-hit/

There will be no screenshots so just don\'t ask. Don\'t ask me what this mod does or any other crap like that. Thanks.
author: tg08096

files.name: Belrands Wolf Will Not Go Hostile if Attacked
files.fileName: Belrands Wolf Will Not Go Hostile if Attacked-19414-1-0.rar
